attributes.title: Science Of Intangible But Powerful Happenings Of Life Is Called Spirituality
attributes.description:
14 MAR 2020

*SCIENCE OF INTANGIBLE BUT POWERFUL HAPPENINGS OF LIFE IS CALLED ‘SPIRITUALITY’. THINGS WHICH IS NOT COGNISABLE BY YOUR BINARY LOGIC AND BINARY LOGIC’S REACH, BUT THINGS WHICH ARE HAPPENING AS PER MULTIDIMENSIONAL LOGIC OF THE UNIVERSE AND WHICH IS THE VERY IMPORTANT COMPONENT OF LIFE - IS CALLED ‘SPIRITUALITY’.

ARROGANTLY BLINDFOLDING YOURSELF WITH THE BINARY LOGIC IS DELUSION. PERSON WHO AWAKENS YOU FROM BINARY LOGIC TO MULTI-DIMENSIONAL LOGIC IS ‘GURU’.

*RAIN IS SELF-PURIFICATION METHOD OF THE FIVE ELEMENTS, IN EVERY SPACE AND PLACE WHERE IT IS HAPPENING. ‘MAARI’ - MAHAMAARI IS THE SELF PURIFICATION METHOD OF WHOLE PRAKRITI. FASTING; PACHAPATTINI VIRATHAM IS SELF PURIFICATION METHOD OF YOUR BEING.

*WATER ELEMENT FROM THE OCEAN GETS PURIFIED FROM FIRE ELEMENT OF SUN AND BECOMES CLOUD. IT GETS SHOWERED AS RAIN, PURIFIES THE EARTH AND AIR SPACE. ALL THE FIVE PURIFYING ITSELF IS RAIN. MAHAMARI - PARASHAKTI IS THE SELF PURIFICATION OF THIS WHOLE PRAKRITI - NATURE.

*FASTING IS THE PURIFYING PROCESS FOR EVERY INDIVIDUAL. NOW, MAHAMARI, IS DOING THIS PACHAPATTINI VIRATHAM. SHE IS PURIFYING NOT ONLY THE WHOLE PRAKRITI, SHE IS OPENING THE OPPORTUNITY TO PURIFY OURSELVES ALONG WITH HER.

*KAILASA IS SPIRITUALLY RESPONSIBLE TO FIND SOLUTIONS FOR EVERY PROBLEM THE WORLD IS FACING. CORONA VIRUS IS SERIOUS PROBLEM HUMANITY IS FACING AS ON NOW.

*THIS PACHAPATTINI VIRATHAM OBSERVED ALONG WITH MAHAMARI IS THE GREATEST SELF-PURIFICATION PROCESS. IT WILL PROTECT YOURSELF FROM CORONA VIRUS AND IT WILL HEAL THE CORONA VIRUS COMPLETELY, AND HUMANITY WILL FREE ITSELF FROM CORONA VIRUS. IT WILL AWAKEN YOUR KUNDALINI INTENSELY AND PARASHAKTI WILL INTENSELY START MANIFESTING.

*WITH THE GRACE OF MAHAGANAPATI, PARAMASHIVA AND PARASHAKTI, LET US START THE PACHAPATTINI VIRATHAM.

*I HAVE A CLEAR DESCRIPTION AND DEFINITION OF THE PACHAPATTINI VIRATHAM. IT WILL BE PROJECTED NOW FOR ALL OF YOU TO SEE. YOU CAN START FOLLOWING THE PACHAPATTINI VIRATHAM. WE HAVE A CLEAR DESCRIPTION AS OBSERVED BY DEVI HERSELF. nithyanandahinduuniversity.org/daily-satsang

*IT WILL INTENSELY MANIFEST PARASHAKTI IN ALL OF US.

*I WILL INITIATE ALL OF YOU. WITH THE GRACE OF PARAMASHIVA AND PARASHAKTI - I CONNECT ALL OF US TO PARASHAKTI AND MAKE US SUCCESSFUL COMPLETE THE PACHAPATTINI VIRATHAM. 

OM NITHYANANDA PARAMASHIVOHAM.
